thread.title: https://www.trustpilot.com/evaluate/embed/fabTXFit

author: https://www.trustpilot.com/evaluate/embed/fabTXFit
title: https://www.trustpilot.com/evaluate/embed/fabTXFit
text: Love the clothes - but have trouble with the bras since they do not have cup sizes listed and all that I have tried are too small in the cup. I'm normally a 32DD, and it's hard to find ones that might work. Please add cute bras for larger cup sizes! Thank you!
